publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6734 Jackson Carlaw: Councillor Pat McPhee, Provost of North Ayrshire Councilâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Councillor Pat McPhee on having been elected as the new Provost of North Ayrshire Council and wishes her every success in this new role. Supported by: Shona Robison*, Derek Brownlee*, Jamie McGrigor*, David McLetchie*, Nanette Milne*, Elizabeth Smith*, Mary Scanlon*, Bill Aitken*, John Lamont*, Gavin Brown*
S3M-6734 Councillor Pat McPhee, Provost of North Ayrshire Council (lodged on 14 July 2010) Margaret Mitchell*, Murdo Fraser*
